There was no response to her suckling and no milk was coming out, with such 
a little tummy and a hungry one too, this was bad news.
The little kit was so hungry that she could have started knawing on 
Starice�s wingers, even though her milk teeth wouldn�t have done anything. 
But strange sounds (Starice talking) were beginning to confuse her again and 
soon she stopped trying to suckle and just stayed in Starice�s arms. Same as 
she would do if danger was close, just stick to mommy�s side.
She couldn�t see but in a few days here eyes would open but without food she 
wouldn�t last that long. Even the jerky movements of her body were getting 
weaker and her whining was getting more common too.
All her little heart desired was warm milk in her tummy and the warmth of 
mommy�s side. But all she got was the warmth of a strangers arms and hunger 
pains.
The baby yipped a bit when Starice got up to get the milk bottles, surprised 
by the sudden movement and cuddling into her arms to try and stay warm and 
safe.
She wasn�t use to all this moving and it was confusing her more but it would 
be worth it since Starice was going to make her tummy pains go away, she was 
just too young to know that right now.
Her thinking patterns were primitive but that was just because she was so 
young, when she grew up more her thoughts would be more complex and 
detailed. But all she knew now was that she was hungry.
By now Starice had already shown her to Epyon and for some reason she could 
smell milk but it wasn�t too much like mommy�s. And she was out of Starice�s 
arms now too so there was the smell of milk but now warm side where it 
should come from.
Having no energy to move the baby just stayed there and whined, feeling cold 
even though milk smelled close. Her whining got louder when her tummy 
rumbled because, by now, her body was warning her that if she didn�t eat 
food soon it would give out on her.
But She was suddenly picked up and it confused and scared her, making her 
whine more before she suddenly smelled something very close to her that 
smelled like�like�, her mouth found the end of the bottle before her nose 
did and the fist thing she did was open her tiny mouth and start to suckle.
A little of the milk leaked out of her mouth and ran down her fuzzy cheek, 
putting her itty paws at the sides of the bottle, even though it didn�t feel 
like mommy�s side and didn�t taste like her milk. But she was SO hungry.
The baby ate with greed, suckling and feeling the milk coat her stomach, 
making little sounds that a suckling baby would when they eat.
